docs.snippet: Costa Rica World Cup midfielder Celso Borges has joined Deportivo La Coruna from Sweden's AIK until the end of the season with an option for the La Liga side to sign him for two more years, the clubs said on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Costa Rica World Cup midfielder Celso Borges has joined Deportivo La Coruna from Sweden's AIK until the end of the season with an option for the La Liga side to sign him for two more years, the clubs said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Costa Rica Midfielder Borges Joins Deportivo La Coruna
headline.print_headline: Costa Rica Midfielder Borges Joins Deportivo La Coruna

docs.snippet: Giovanni Simeone wants to be known for his skills and not as the son of Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone after impressing in a two-goal performance for Argentina's under-20 side.
docs.lead_paragraph: Giovanni Simeone wants to be known for his skills and not as the son of Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone after impressing in a two-goal performance for Argentina's under-20 side.

headline.main: Simeone Junior Keen to Make His Own Name With Argentina
headline.print_headline: Simeone Junior Keen to Make His Own Name With Argentina

docs.snippet: Gaston Bertinotti of Argentina had a 4-under 68 on Thursday to share the lead with three other players in the first round of the inaugural Latin America Amateur Championship.
docs.lead_paragraph: Gaston Bertinotti of Argentina had a 4-under 68 on Thursday to share the lead with three other players in the first round of the inaugural Latin America Amateur Championship.

headline.main: Bertinotti Among 4 Tied for Lead in Latin America Amateur
headline.print_headline: Bertinotti Among 4 Tied for Lead in Latin America Amateur

docs.snippet: Andre Tourinho of Brazil had eight birdies in his round of 6-under 66, giving him a one-shot lead Friday going into the weekend of the Latin American Amateur with a Masters invitation on the line.
docs.lead_paragraph: Andre Tourinho of Brazil had eight birdies in his round of 6-under 66, giving him a one-shot lead Friday going into the weekend of the Latin American Amateur with a Masters invitation on the line.

headline.main: Tourinho Has 1-Shot Lead at Latin American Amateur
headline.print_headline: Tourinho Has 1-Shot Lead at Latin American Amateur

docs.snippet: The first same-sex marriage was held Saturday in Mexicali, after officials ended an 18-month fight that led to a Mexican Supreme Court order to permit the wedding, a lawyer for the couple said.
docs.lead_paragraph: The first same-sex marriage was held Saturday in Mexicali, after officials ended an 18-month fight that led to a Mexican Supreme Court order to permit the wedding, a lawyer for the couple said.

headline.main: Lawyer: Mexican City Allows Same-Sex Wedding After Long Fight
headline.print_headline: Lawyer: Mexico City Allows Same-Sex Wedding After Long Fight

docs.snippet: Javier Pastore and Edinson Cavani scored late as Paris St Germain ignored their fans' boos and recovered from a shaky start to beat visiting strugglers Evian Thonon Gaillard 4-2 on Sunday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Javier Pastore and Edinson Cavani scored late as Paris St Germain ignored their fans' boos and recovered from a shaky start to beat visiting strugglers Evian Thonon Gaillard 4-2 on Sunday.

headline.main: PSG Recover From Bad Start to Snatch Much-Needed Win
headline.print_headline: PSG Recover From Bad Start to Snatch Much-Needed Win

docs.snippet: Pope Francis said Monday he hopes to visit Ecuador, Bolivia and Paraguay this year, as well as the Central African Republic and Uganda.
docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis said Monday he hopes to visit Ecuador, Bolivia and Paraguay this year, as well as the Central African Republic and Uganda.

headline.main: Pope's 2015 Travel: Ecuador, Bolivia, Paraguay, CAR, Uganda
headline.print_headline: Pope's 2015 Travel: Ecuador, Bolivia, Paraguay, CAR, Uganda

docs.snippet: Pope Francis said Monday he hopes to visit Ecuador, Bolivia and Paraguay this year, as well as the Central African Republic and Uganda.

docs.snippet: An increasing number of spaces offer travelers all-inclusive co-working facilities in exotic locations, intertwining vacation time with job time.
docs.lead_paragraph: An increasing number of spaces offer travelers all-inclusive co-working facilities in exotic locations, intertwining vacation time with job time.
docs.abstract: Co-working facilities provide offices in exotic locales, adding benefits of vacation to work assignments; growing number of co-working spaces are temporary.

headline.main: Co-Working on Vacation: A Desk in Paradise

docs.snippet: Parma, joint bottom of Serie A alongside Cesena, have signed Uruguay midfielder Cristian Rodriguez and Portugal forward Silvestre Varela, both on loan, the club said on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Parma, joint bottom of Serie A alongside Cesena, have signed Uruguay midfielder Cristian Rodriguez and Portugal forward Silvestre Varela, both on loan, the club said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Serie A Strugglers Parma Sign Varela, Rodriguez
headline.print_headline: Serie A Strugglers Parma Sign Varela, Rodriguez
